subject: {{extras.customer.contact_name}} does not want to check their eligibility

rows.text: Your end user {{extras.customer.contact_name}} has declined your invitation to check their eligibility for finance on Kanda. Please get in touch with the end user if you have any questions.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at howdens@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911.
